about.title: More Than Just a Gym
about.body: FitLife Performance opened in 2018 with a mission to create a results-driven fitness community. We combine expert coaching, cutting-edge equipment, science-based training, and nutrition support to help members achieve transformations that last. Our 15,000 sq ft facility features specialized training zones, recovery areas, and a motivating atmosphere where everyone from beginners to athletes can thrive.

team.title: Meet Your Coaches
team.subtitle: Certified professionals dedicated to your success

members.name: Mike Rodriguez
members.title: Head Coach & Owner
members.bio: Former collegiate athlete with 12+ years of coaching experience. Specializes in strength training, athletic performance, and body recomposition. Mike has helped hundreds of clients achieve their fitness goals through science-based training and personalized coaching.

members.name: Amanda Chen
members.title: Senior Trainer & Nutrition Coach
members.bio: Amanda combines her passion for fitness with nutrition science to create comprehensive transformation programs. She specializes in women's fitness, metabolic conditioning, and sustainable habit change. Her holistic approach has helped clients achieve life-changing results.

members.name: Jamal Washington
members.title: Performance Coach
members.bio: With a background in sports performance and physical therapy, Jamal focuses on injury prevention, functional movement, and athletic development. He works with everyone from post-rehab clients to competitive athletes, ensuring safe and effective training progressions.

members.name: Lisa Martinez
members.title: Group Fitness Director
members.bio: Lisa brings energy and expertise to every class she teaches. From HIIT to yoga, she creates programming that challenges and motivates members of all fitness levels. Her inclusive teaching style makes everyone feel welcome and capable.

items.text: I've tried countless gyms and programs over the years. FitLife is different. The coaching is exceptional, the community is supportive, and the results speak for themselves. Down 45 pounds and feeling stronger than ever!
items.author: Sarah Martinez

items.text: As someone who was intimidated by gyms, FitLife made me feel welcome from day one. Coach Amanda helped me build confidence and taught me proper form. I'm now lifting weights I never thought possible and feel amazing!
items.author: Jessica Torres

items.text: The Elite membership is worth every penny. Between the personal training, nutrition coaching, and community support, I've made more progress in 8 months than I did in years of training alone. Best investment I've ever made in myself.
items.author: Marcus Thompson

items.text: I joined for the facility but stayed for the people. The coaches genuinely care about your progress and the members are incredibly supportive. FitLife isn't just a gym - it's a community that pushes you to be your best.
items.author: David Chen

booking.title: Free Consultation
booking.description: Book a tour, meet the team, and get a personalized fitness assessment

items.question: What membership is right for me?
items.answer: Basic is great for self-motivated members who want gym access. Performance is our most popular option, including unlimited classes and personal training. Elite is perfect if you want a comprehensive transformation with nutrition coaching and weekly check-ins. Book a free consultation and we'll help you choose!

items.question: Can I try before I commit?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer a free 7-day trial for new members. You'll get full access to the facility, group classes, and a complimentary personal training session to experience everything FitLife offers.

items.question: Are personal training sessions included?
items.answer: Performance members get 2 PT sessions per month, Elite members get 8 per month. Basic members can purchase personal training separately. All new members receive one complimentary session.

items.question: What if I'm a complete beginner?
items.answer: We love working with beginners! Our coaches specialize in teaching proper form and building confidence. We offer beginner-friendly classes, personalized programming, and a judgment-free environment. Everyone starts somewhere!

items.question: Can I pause or cancel my membership?
items.answer: Yes. You can pause your membership for up to 3 months (small hold fee applies). To cancel, we require 30 days notice. No long-term contracts - you can cancel anytime.

items.question: Do you offer nutrition coaching?
items.answer: Performance members get a nutrition assessment, and Elite members receive complete meal planning and weekly nutrition check-ins. We also offer standalone nutrition coaching packages.

items.question: What equipment do you have?
items.answer: Our 15,000 sq ft facility includes: full range of free weights, squat racks, benches, cable machines, cardio equipment (treadmills, rowers, bikes), functional training area, recovery room with massage chairs, and dedicated class studio.

items.question: Can I bring a friend?
items.answer: Elite members get 4 guest passes per month. Performance members get 2 per month. Basic members can purchase day passes for guests. We also run 'Bring a Friend' events monthly!
